column5: I was wondering if anyone know where I can buy Belv. Vodka in Ontario? If so, how much is it? I am not sure if I want to bring it in and pay the duty or buy it up there. Thank you for your responses. Jerry

It is hard to find, depending were you go. I like Kettle One, and asked the place to order it for me a few weeks in advance, and they did with no problem. A bit more expensive, but not too bad. Better than drinking smirnoff! <{{}}><
f247 - you're permitted one bottle duty free anyway. - phish
I am already bringing in a case of beer. I found some at LCBO but they are only open until 6:00 in Kenora. I hope we make it up there by then.
My advice is to take a bottle of vodka across the border and buy Canadian beer to drink.
